version_description: We’ve worked under the hood to improve the stability and security of the app.
We’ve worked under the hood to improve the speed and security of the app, and we fixed some bugs too.

Big news: Qurami gets a new look and joins ufirst, the app that allows you to skip the line in the most crowded places of your city.

With the ufirst qurami app you can take advantage of many new services that let you save your time!

Enable automatic updates, many new features are coming soon!
Big news: Qurami gets a new look and joins ufirst. Enable automatic updates, many new features are coming soon!

Big news: Qurami becomes ufirst to let you save time in many more places! Enjoy the redesigned app and discover the all new services. Enable automatic updates, many new features are coming soon!

In this version you can buy the fast-track pass for many airports and the ticket to be the first in line at tourist attractions!
